Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the maximum allowable timeframes to respond to requests for records under the freedom of information act
Summary: Relates to the maximum allowable time frames to respond to requests for records under the freedom of information act.
LawCode: Amd ยง89, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to time frames for responding to requests for records under the freedom of information act
